text.text_translated:
Dreams are like stories or pictures in your head when you sleep.

Sometimes, dreams come from our mind. Our mind thinks about things from the day. But dreams have a special meaning. When we are not sleeping, we think with words. It is like we talk to ourselves. But when we are sleeping, our brain changes. The part for words works less. The part for feelings works more.
